VCPPltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtBusiness SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDigital transformation is changing industries and to our customers the application is the lifeblood of the modern organization u itus how a business competes in the market and delivers value to its endusers The culmination of macro trends around applications locations and hardware is all about transforming to deliver modern workloads that bring business opportunity No longer are organizations focused on the traditional ntier web and mobile applications Digital foundation will facilitate modern workloads because they will become the new norm  more common place And the applications that drive those workloads will become more composite in nature and therefore we now see the emergence of the subscription economy with freedom to access services and always use them anytime and anywhere with the latest technology or product model available at our fingertips The cloud journey can be difficult as organizations struggle through strategy around rationalization of existing datacenters to choices around hybrid and multicloud models There is unprecedented opportunity today for Managed Services Providers to lead organizations through their cloud journey to the future This is a great and challenging opportunity to join the VMware Cloud Provider MSP program as a Cloud Solution Architect Specialist where you will be at the forefront of multicloud thought leadership and work with Managed Services Providers to drive successltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob
